data.author: Guy Pearce
data.quote: Success comes in waves.

data.author: Marlee Matlin
data.quote: The handicap of deafness is not in the ear; it is in the mind.

data.author: Thomas Jefferson
data.quote: Do you want to know who you are? Don't ask. Act! Action will delineate and define you.

data.author: Joseph Barber Lightfoot
data.quote: Plant thy foot firmly in the prints which His foot has made before thee.

data.author: Og Mandino
data.quote: Obstacles are necessary for success because in selling, as in all careers of importance, victory comes only after many struggles and countless defeats.

data.author: Mireille Guiliano
data.quote: Make treating yourself a priority and always remember your life is happening now. Don't put off all your dreams and pleasures to another day. In any balanced personal definition of success there has to be a powerful element of living life in the present.

data.author: John Madden
data.quote: The only yardstick for success our society has is being a champion. No one remembers anything else.

data.author: Benjamin Disraeli
data.quote: The secret of success in life is for a man to be ready for his opportunity when it comes.

data.author: Thomas J. Watson
data.quote: If you want to increase your success rate, double your failure rate.

data.author: Ellen DeGeneres
data.quote: Find out who you are and be that person. That's what your soul was put on this Earth to be. Find that truth, live that truth and everything else will come.

data.author: B. C. Forbes
data.quote: The man who has done his level best... is a success, even though the world may write him down a failure.

data.author: Bruce Dickinson
data.quote: Teachers need to be more inspirational. But it's also up to engineering to make itself more interesting.

data.author: Danny Glover
data.quote: Every day of my life I walk with the idea that I am black, no matter how successful I am. And our success is tempered by that; you're successful in this way given the fact you are black, and most blacks don't get to that point.

data.author: Larry Flynt
data.quote: The only question to ask yourself is, how much are you willing to sacrifice to achieve this success?

data.author: Richard Bach
data.quote: You are always free to change your mind and choose a different future, or a different past.

data.author: Daniel H. Pink
data.quote: Typically, if you reward something, you get more of it. You punish something, you get less of it. And our businesses have been built for the last 150 years very much on that kind of motivational scheme.

data.author: Bruce Rauner
data.quote: Success is all about persistence and doing the right thing for the long term.

data.author: Conrad Hilton
data.quote: Success seems to be connected with action. Successful people keep moving. They make mistakes, but they don't quit.

data.author: Desiderius Erasmus
data.quote: Give light, and the darkness will disappear of itself.

data.author: Deepak Chopra
data.quote: Success comes when people act together; failure tends to happen alone.
